name: File Attachment Types in Preview - Image

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes:
JB - Thursday, December 10, 2020
- Expanded steps to cover various file types (needed to map to cypress properly)
JB - Wednesday, Feb 3, 2021
- Extracted file type test cases to its own

inline.description:
JPG
--------------------
1. Post a JPG file
2. Click on posted image
3. Click on Download link
inline.expectedResult:
After #1,
  • Verify image is posted

After #2,
  • Verify Download link is displayed in preview modal

After #3,
  • Verify image is downloaded
